sections.heading: life activity, defined.Major life activity means a function such as caring for oneself, performing manual tasks, walking, seeing, hearing, speaking, breathing, learning, and working

sections.text:
69-2609.Major life activity, defined.

Major life activity means a function such as caring for oneself, performing manual tasks, walking, seeing, hearing, speaking, breathing, learning, and working.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 802, ยง 9.
